intro: The International Summer School on Software Engineering (ISSSE) aims at providing a forum to let Master and fresh Ph.D. students get in touch with top Software Engineering scholars and the research they pursue. The school is at its 11th edition and typically attracts around 30-40 Ph.D. students from all around the world.
